content: Hi guys, just drop by to say hi and to share with you some of the graphics I have done, feel free to download. comments.author: bober182
comments.body: Code:Public domain in JapanHence, even when some materials are said to be "in the public domain" there can be some use restrictions. In that case, the term copyright-free is sometimes used instead. Many pre-1953 Japanese and non-Japanese films are considered to be in the public domain in Japan.There is public domain in every country to my knowledge.
